# Ignore meta files
*.meta

# Ignore auto-generated Unity folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# Exclude specific files related to Lightmaps and Shaders Cache
LightmapsSnapshot
ShaderCache/

# Ignore OS-specific files
# Windows
[Dd]esktop.ini
[Tt]humbs.db
[Dd]S_Store

# macOS
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride
Icon?
__MACOSX/
._*

# Ignore VS and MonoDevelop project files
.vscode/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Ignore crash reports
sysinfo.txt

# Ignore built application files
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage

# Ignore temporary backup files
*.bak
*.old
*.tmp
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Ignore player log files
Player.log
Player-prev.log

# Ignore build logs
*.log

# Ignore Addressable Asset settings
Assets/AddressableAssetsData/

# Ignore specific AMD DX9 Cache (if on Windows with AMD GPU)
AppData/Local/AMD/DX9Cache/

# Optional: ignore any custom builds or archives
*.zip
*.rar
*.7z
